dataflowSinks.name: UserQueryOutputdataSet
dataflowSinks.script:
sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> UserQueryOutputdataSet

dataflowSinks.name: UserQueryOutputdataSet
dataflowSinks.script:
sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> UserQueryOutputdataSet

userProperties.name: filesDeleted
userProperties.value: all txt files in adfdemo is deleted

scriptLines: Address as (state as string, country as string, zipcode as string),
Contact as (Phone as string, email as string)

sources.name: EmployeeDataSet
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> EmployeeDataSet

scriptLines: ITEmployees, HREmployees, PayrollEmployee union(byName: true)~> unionALLEmployees

sources.name: EmployeeDataSet

source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> EmployeeDataSet
